name: Boxes Moving Co
description:
Welcome !

This highly personalized message is sent to hundreds of new employees just like you every minute! At Boxes Moving Co, you will join thousands of faceless drones to throw boxes around because we asked you to. Sometimes the work will seem more like a puzzle than a moving job, but it doesn't matter where the boxes go or if their contents survive. All that matters is you keep the machines from running out of space.

You will love your job, because our personalized motivational messages will make you feel appreciated! You will also be promoted for every meaningless task you perform.

-Boxes Moving Co Executives

Boxes Moving Co is a fast paced VR puzzle game built around the concept of running out of space and moving boxes. It is designed for PCVR and Quest / Quest 2. Don't have a VR headset? The game also plays great outside of VR,

This game was made for the Epic MegaJam 2021.

This was made by team Ex Fedders:

Chromatic - Coding and Game Design

Ashenjade - Visuals

Gen Graded - Audio Design
